title: Eagle feather headdress

title: Headdress with Container Case
desc: Buffalo skin cover containing a headdress of red and blue cloth decorated with buffalo horns; fur, feathers, and quill and bead work; buffalo felt; a bird skin mounted on bark; and two feathers; Acquisition Source: Cadzow, Donald A. (Collector & MAI Agent); Collection Site: File Hills Reserve; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian
